Package org.spongepowered.api.item.enchantment

Class EnchantmentTypes

java.lang.Object
org.spongepowered.api.item.enchantment.EnchantmentTypes
public final class EnchantmentTypes extends Object
An enumeration of known EnchantmentTypes.

In vanilla the minimum level of these is 1, while the max levels vary.

  • Field Details

    • AQUA_AFFINITY

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> AQUA_AFFINITY
      Increases regular underwater mining speed.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 1.

    • BANE_OF_ARTHROPODS

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> BANE_OF_ARTHROPODS
      Increases damages and causes slowness for a variable amount of time depending on the level to "arthropod" mobs. In vanilla this includes spiders, cave spiders, silverfish, and endermites.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 5.

    • BINDING_CURSE

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> BINDING_CURSE
      Prevents removal of the cursed items that reside in the armor slots.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 1.

    • BLAST_PROTECTION

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> BLAST_PROTECTION
      Reduces explosion damage.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 4.

    • CHANNELING

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> CHANNELING

    • DEPTH_STRIDER

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> DEPTH_STRIDER
      Increases underwater movement speed.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

    • EFFICIENCY

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> EFFICIENCY
      Increases mining speed.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 5.

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> FEATHER_FALLING

      In vanilla the maximum level is 4.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 2.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 4.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 1.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> FROST_WALKER
      Creates frosted ice blocks when walking over water.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 2.

    • IMPALING

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> IMPALING

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> INFINITY
      Causing shooting arrows to not consume regular arrows.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 1.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 2.

      Increases luck while fishing.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> LURE
      Increases rate of fish biting your hook while fishing.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> MENDING
      Repair item durability with experience.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 1.

    • PROJECTILE_PROTECTION

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> PROJECTILE_PROTECTION
      Reduces projectile damage you take, for example from arrows, ghasts, blaze fire charges, and similar in vanilla.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 4.

    • PROTECTION

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> PROTECTION
      Reduces all damage, outside of a few sources that bypass armor, such as the void, the kill command, and hunger damage in vanilla.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 4.

    • PUNCH

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> PUNCH
      Increases knockback by shot arrows.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 2.

    • QUICK_CHARGE

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> QUICK_CHARGE

    • RESPIRATION

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> RESPIRATION
      Extends underwater breathing time.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

    • RIPTIDE

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> RIPTIDE

    • SHARPNESS

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> SHARPNESS
      Increases melee damage.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 5.

    • SILK_TOUCH

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> SILK_TOUCH
      Allows collection of blocks that are normally unobtainable, such as diamond ore, cocoa, mycelium, and similar in vanilla.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 1.

    • SMITE

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> SMITE
      Increases damage to "undead" mobs. In vanilla this includes skeletons, skeletons, zombies, withers, wither skeletons, zombie pigmen, skeleton horses and zombie horses.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 5.

    • SOUL_SPEED

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> SOUL_SPEED

    • SWEEPING

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> SWEEPING
      Increases the damage of the sweeping attack.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

    • THORNS

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> THORNS
      Attackers are damaged when they deal damage to the wearer.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

    • UNBREAKING

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> UNBREAKING
      Increases effective durability.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

    • VANISHING_CURSE

      public static final DefaultedRegistryReference<EnchantmentType> VANISHING_CURSE
      Causes the item to disappear on death.

      In vanilla the maximum level is 1.
